appDescription: Effortlessly manage schedules, optimize resources, stay on budget, minimize risks, define scope, and deliver exceptional quality. Experience the power of comprehensive project management in one intuitive app. Start mastering your projects today!
mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms of Service in order to use this service and the privacy policy.
pageNotFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. You might have the wrong address, or the page may have moved.
taskNotFoundDesc: The task you're looking for doesn't exist. It may have been deleted or moved.
announcementNotFoundDesc: The announcement you're looking for doesn't exist. It may have been deleted or moved.
eventNotFoundDesc: The event you're looking for doesn't exist. It may have been deleted or moved.
scheduleDescription: Effectively manage project timelines and tasks. Create, update, and track project schedules to ensure timely completion.
resourceDescription: Optimize resource allocation. Identify and assign the right team members, equipment, and materials to maximize productivity and efficiency.
budgetDescription: Maintain financial control. Plan and track project expenses, monitor budgets, and make informed decisions to stay within budgetary constraints.
riskDescription: Mitigate project risks. Identify potential risks, develop strategies to minimize their impact, and proactively manage unforeseen challenges.
scopeDescription: Define project objectives and boundaries. Clearly articulate project goals, deliverables, and requirements to ensure a shared understanding among stakeholders.
qualityDescription: Uphold high standards of quality. Implement quality control measures, monitor deliverables, and foster continuous improvement to deliver exceptional results.

syncProfileDesc.body: Use this feature to store your personalized settings to the cloud. Whenever you switch computers, simply retrieve your saved profile to instantly get back to your familiar setup. Say goodbye to reconfiguring and enjoy a seamless transition with your preferences always at hand.

landingTitle: Unlocking Project Success with Project Mastar
landingSubTitle: A Comprehensive Exploration of Project Management Essentials and Tools
featuresSubtitle: Take control of your projects and collaborate effectively with our intuitive project management tool. From planning to execution, we've got you covered.

featureCard.title: Task Management
featureCard.description: Organize and prioritize tasks with ease using our intuitive interface.

featureCard.title: Team Collaboration
featureCard.description: Foster seamless communication and collaboration among team members.

featureCard.title: Real-time Analytics
featureCard.description: Track project progress and performance with insightful analytics.

featureCard.title: Mobile Access
featureCard.description: Manage your projects on-the-go with our responsive mobile app.

featureCard.title: Resource Allocation & Workload Balancing
featureCard.description: Optimize resource allocation with task assignments, workload visualization, and balanced work distribution.

featureCard.title: Risk Management & Mitigation
featureCard.description: Identify project risks, assess impact and likelihood, and create mitigation plans.

featureCard.title: Time Tracking & Timesheets
featureCard.description: Record task durations for billing, resource allocation, and project evaluation.

featureCard.title: Gantt Charts & Dependencies
featureCard.description: Visualize project timelines, task dependencies, and critical paths.

highlightsTitle: Discover the Power of Our Products
highlightsSubtitle: Explore the innovative features of Project Mastar that transform project management into an efficient and streamlined process for teams of all sizes.

highlightCard.title: Define Project Scope
highlightCard.description: Clearly outline the project objectives, deliverables, and constraints to set the direction for the project.

highlightCard.title: Create Project Plan
highlightCard.description: Develop a detailed project plan including tasks, timelines, resources, and dependencies to guide project execution.

highlightCard.title: Assign Tasks and Responsibilities
highlightCard.description: Allocate tasks to team members based on their skills and expertise, and define clear responsibilities for each team member.

highlightCard.title: Monitor Progress and Adjust
highlightCard.description: Regularly track project progress, identify any deviations from the plan, and make necessary adjustments to keep the project on track.

callToActionTitle: Ready to take your project management to the next level?
callToActionSubtitle: Sign up now and start managing your projects more efficiently.
testimonialsSubtitle: Explore real-life case studies that illustrate the successful outcomes achieved through the use of Project Mastar.

testimonialCard.name: John Doe
testimonialCard.title: Project Manager
testimonialCard.text: This project management tool has greatly improved our team's efficiency and communication. Highly recommended!

testimonialCard.name: Jane Smith
testimonialCard.title: Senior Project Coordinator
testimonialCard.text: I have used many project management platforms, but this one stands out for its user-friendly interface and robust features.

testimonialCard.name: David Johnson
testimonialCard.title: IT Project Lead
testimonialCard.text: Our project team saw a significant increase in productivity after implementing this project management solution.

testimonialCard.name: Sarah Lee
testimonialCard.title: Marketing Project Manager
testimonialCard.text: I love how customizable and intuitive this project management tool is. It has truly streamlined our project workflows.

privacyPolicyDesc: This privacy policy sets out how our website uses and protects any information that you give us when you use this website.
informationCollectDesc: We may collect the following information:
collectInfoList: Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers
howWeUseInfoDesc: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons:
useInfoList: Sending promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information which we think you may find interesting

From time to time, we may also use your information to contact you for market research purposes. We may contact you by email, phone, or mail. We may use the information to customize the website according to your interests.
securityInfo: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.
cookiesInfo: A cookie is a small file that asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added, and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site.

Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes, and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.

Overall, cookies help us provide you with a better website by enabling us to monitor which pages you find useful and which you do not. A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.
linksToOtherWebsitesInfo: Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other website. Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites and such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and lookout the privacy statement applicable to the website in question.
controllingPersonalInfoDesc: You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways:
controllingPersonalInfoList: If you have previously agreed to us using your personal information for direct marketing purposes, you may change your mind at any time by writing to or emailing us at privacy@example.com.

We will not sell, distribute, or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so. We may use your personal information to send you promotional information about third parties which we think you may find interesting if you tell us that you wish this to happen.

You may request details of personal information which we hold about you under the Data Protection Act 1998. A small fee will be payable. If you would like a copy of the information held on you, please write to us.
If you believe that any information we are holding on you is incorrect or incomplete, please write to or email us as soon as possible. We will promptly correct any information found to be incorrect.
privacyPolicySubjectToChange: This privacy policy is subject to change without notice.
importTaskDescription: Download the Excel template, fill in the task details, and upload the file to import tasks.
selectFile: Please select a file to import.
importFail: Failed to import tasks. Please try again.
chooseCategory: or choose a category to quickly find the help you need
whatIsProjectMastarAnswer: Project Mastar is a project management app designed to help teams organize and track their projects efficiently.
howToCreateProject: How do I create a new project?
howToCreateProjectAnswer: Click on the 'Create Your First Project' button on the dashboard. Enter the project title and description. Set up your team members and assign roles. Click 'Create' to finalize your project setup.
howToEditProject: How can I edit a project after it's created?
howToEditProjectAnswer: Click on the project card from your dashboard. You'll find options to edit project details, team members, and roles.
howToDeleteProjectAnswer: Yes, you can delete a project by selecting it and choosing the 'Delete' option. Note that this action is irreversible.
howToAddTeamMembers: How do I add team members to a project?
howToAddTeamMembersAnswer: During the project creation process, navigate to the 'Team Members Setup' tab. Select or invite members from your organization. Assign roles such as Project Manager, Team Member, or Stakeholder.
whatRolesCanAssign: What roles can I assign to team members?
whatRolesCanAssignAnswer: You can assign the following roles: Project Manager, Team Member, Stakeholder.
howToContactSupportAnswer: If you need help, please contact our support team via the 'Help' section in the app or email us at support@projectmastar.com.
notFoundAnswerContactUs: If you cannot find a question in our FAQ, you can always contact us. We will answer you shortly!
happyToHelp: We are always happy to help!
bestWayToGetAnswer: Best way to get answer faster!
userManualWelcome: Welcome to Project Mastar! This comprehensive project management tool helps teams organize, track, and collaborate on projects efficiently.
setupStep1: 1. Complete the registration form with your details
setupStep3: 3. Log in to access the dashboard
setupStep4: 4. Create your first project or join an existing one
contactSupport: For technical support or feature requests, please contact the development team.
userManualThemeToggleDesc: Switch between light and dark modes
userManualNotificationsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Real-time notifications for task assignments and updates
‚Ä¢ Click the bell icon to view all notifications
‚Ä¢ Mark notifications as read/unread
‚Ä¢ "Read All" option for bulk actions
userManualCreatingProjectSteps:
1. From the Dashboard, click "Create Your First Project"
2. Enter project title and description
3. Add team members and assign roles:
   ‚Ä¢ Project Manager: Full project control
   ‚Ä¢ Team Member: Can work on assigned tasks
   ‚Ä¢ Stakeholder: View-only access with oversight
4. Set project start date and initial settings
5. Click "Create" to finalize
userManualRoleManagerDesc: Full control over project and tasks
userManualCreatingTasksSteps:
1. Navigate to Project ‚Üí Progress
2. Click the "Create Task" button (floating action button)
3. Fill in task details:
   ‚Ä¢ Task Name (required)
   ‚Ä¢ Description (supports rich text formatting)
   ‚Ä¢ Category (optional)
   ‚Ä¢ Assigned Team Members
   ‚Ä¢ Priority Level (Very High to Very Low)
   ‚Ä¢ Difficulty Level (Easy to Very Difficult)
   ‚Ä¢ Estimated Start and End Dates
   ‚Ä¢ Tags and Milestones
4. Add attachments if needed
5. Click "Create" to save
userManualMovingTasksSteps:
1. Right-click on a task (or use the three-dot menu)
2. Select "Move to another project"
3. Choose the target project from the dropdown
4. Confirm the move
5. Task will be moved and all users will see the update in real-time
userManualContextDuplicate: Create a copy of the task
